text: Martha Ruth Cohen, CM, AOE, LLD (née Block; 1920 – February 26, 2015) was a Canadian community activist and philanthropist. She was a member of the Order of Canada. Cohen was of Jewish descent. == References == ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Canadian activists Category:Canadian Jews Category:Jewish philanthropists Category:People from Alberta
title: Martha Cohen
